title: Roast goose with apple sultana stuffing
ingredients: ['1 whole goose, 4 to 5 kg', '3 sticks celery, chopped', '3 onions, chopped', '2 tablespoons butter', '500g chopped, peeled apples', '275g sultanas', '275g cubed day-old white bread', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '125ml apple juice', '125ml water']
